column1: This is classic Booker long list
The precipitating event- the disappearance of a young girl and the impact on the village where she went missing is tracked year by year
Life does have a certain sameness (monotony) to it
column3: but that's not always fun to read

column1: This is not a mystery or a procedural
There have been other novels with this same theme this year and perhaps because I read them first
column2: this quiet and well written book did not grab me

column1: Thanks to Edelweiss for the ARC
Try this if you are a fan of thoughtful British fiction
